level.heading: Member's liability to third parties.
level.text: A member of a membership corporation shall not be as such, personally liable for the acts, debts, liabilities, or obligations of the corporation.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 29-404.14 and ยง 29-809.09.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.
